name: Shell Sweet Shell (brittneysart)
description:
A hermit crab, Shelly, wants a brand new and shiny shell to call home. The only problem is that she doesn't know where to find the best shell. She must walk and jump her way around the crabitat to find the perfect shell. Along the way, she meets the other crabs who give their best tips and clues to help Shelly in her journey. Will she find the perfect shell to call home?

Shell Sweet Shell is a 3D video game that is inspired by my pet hermit crabs.

- Credits -

Director + Generalist - Brittney Renee Wilson

Level + Game Design - Kamil Rapacz

Environment Modeling + Level Design - Eddie Anaya

Concept Art + Animation - Edith Flores

Character Rigging - Connor Rolland

Sound + Music - Joseph Montgomery and Andrew Casas

Advisor - Carol Ashley

Special thanks to our Art 455C Group Projects class!

Created with: Unreal Engine, Autodesk Maya, ZBrush, Substance Painter, Adobe Photoshop, Procreate

California State University, Fullerton

Art 455C - 3D Group Projects

Fall 2021
